data.name: Adventure In Aellion - Anniversary Gift
data.detailed_description:
The Anniversary Gift is Downloadable Content for Adventure In Aellion in which the player will be able to equip exclusive hats to their character.
This DLC is limited to all who purchased the game in its first year of sale in Early Access.
This DLC will let the player equip either a Crown Band, a Crown Cap or a Tiara

data.short_description: The Anniversary Gift is Downloadable Content for Adventure In Aellion in which the player will be able to equip exclusive hats ( Crown Band, a Crown Cap, or a Tiara) to their character. This DLC is limited to all who purchased the game in its first year of sale in Early Access

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 670 or AMD R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
